tool_description: TheGivingLab.org helps charities, companies and developers develop, launch and scale new fundraising ideas and products, services and games which benefit UK charities. Our APIs make it easy to collect donations, take payments, reclaim gift aid, organ
name: TheGivingLab
title: TheGivingLab

api_list.name: Authenticate
RegisterUser
CreateUser
api_list.description: you can call the following method to create the profile on TheGivingLab.org

api_list.name: Group-Add
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://the-giving-lab-thegivinglab.p.rapidapi.com/groups/group/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-giving-lab-thegivinglab.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
